law.text: Every practicing optometrist shall display in a conspicuous place at the entrance to his office the true full name of the person practicing therein and shall keep his license certificate conspicuously displayed in his place of practice so that it can easily be seen and read.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 361, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 256, sec. 12, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 10, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 183, sec. 10.
